entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow over higher terrain in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h except west 40 gusting to 60 over western sections late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Snow over higher terrain in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h except west 40 gusting to 60 over western sections early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
